subsection.name: Organization
subsection.p: apache-james-imap-api contains the interfaces, exceptions and Constants needed by the other projects.

apache-james-imap-message allows to encode, decode and structure the IMAP requests and responses. It will provide among other the ImapRequestMessage and ImapResponseMessage implementation to be processed by the apache-james-imap-processor project.

apache-james-imap-processor implements the Chain Of Responsibility design pattern. ImapRequestMessage and ImapResponder will be passed to the list of Processors that will execute doProcess if applicable.
apache-james-imap-protocol-tester can be used by other projects to test the IMAP protocol in conjunction with a James mailbox.
